1.verse: Salutation - The elder to the elect lady and her children, whom I love in the truth, and not only I but also all who know the truth,

2.verse: because of the truth which abides in us and will be with us for ever:

3.verse: Grace, mercy, and peace will be with us, from God the Father and from Jesus Christ the Father’s Son, in truth and love.

4.verse: Truth and Love - I rejoiced greatly to find some of your children following the truth, just as we have been commanded by the Father.

5.verse: And now I beg you, lady, not as though I were writing you a new commandment, but the one we have had from the beginning, that we love one another.

6.verse: And this is love, that we follow his commandments; this is the commandment, as you have heard from the beginning, that you follow love.

7.verse: For many deceivers have gone out into the world, men who will not acknowledge the coming of Jesus Christ in the flesh; such a one is the deceiver and the antichrist.

8.verse: Look to yourselves, that you may not lose what you have worked for, but may win a full reward.

9.verse: Any one who goes ahead and does not abide in the doctrine of Christ does not have God; he who abides in the doctrine has both the Father and the Son.

10.verse: If any one comes to you and does not bring this doctrine, do not receive him into the house or give him any greeting;

11.verse: for he who greets him shares his wicked work.

12.verse: Final Greetings - Though I have much to write to you, I would rather not use paper and ink, but I hope to come to see you and talk with you face to face, so that our joy may be complete.

13.verse: The children of your elect sister greet you.
